name: Aghanim
unlock_text: This is a free God that is permanently unlocked by completing the 7-day newcomer quest

powers.name: Sorcery for Dummies: Volume 1
powers.desc: Has a chance to upgrade a random spell on your team every round (includes any unequipped spells). Cannot upgrade the same spell consecutive times. Chance scales with shop level.

name: Alchemist
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Greevil's Greed
powers.desc: Your gold never resets. For every 11/10/9/8/7 gold saved at the end of combat, you gain 1 additional gold. Amount of gold required depends on the level of your shop.

powers.name: Unstable Concoction
powers.desc: Every round loss will gain a charge to this ability. Any win resets the charges to 0. If the charges reach 3, you will take 15% current HP in damage and the charges will reset to 0. Charges can not be less than 0.

name: Bloodseeker
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Blood Frenzy
powers.desc: Each ally hero death will enfrenzy selected unit with attack speed and lifesteal.

name: Boneless Aghanim
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.name: Sorcery For Dummies: Volume 3
powers.desc: Ultimates never enter your pool of spells. You gain an extra shop slot at shop level 3.

name: The Boomer
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Bile Explosion
powers.desc: Ally heroes will explode on death dealing damage in area. Damage dealt is a percentage of the damage taken that round. After exploding, a puddle of bile will remain on the ground that will cause enemies to take extra damage. Debuff is stackable.

name: Brewmaster
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.name: Drunken Brawler
powers.desc:
Switch stances to provide unique buffs to your units.

Earth Stance - Grants armor and magic resistance.

Storm Stance - Grants evasion and bonus attack speed.

Fire Stance - Grants a chance to deal critical damage with attacks.

Void Stance - Grants status resistance and attack speed and movespeed slow on attacks.

name: Centaur
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Great Fortitude
powers.desc: Selected hero will gain HP per round. They will also return a percent of damage dealt by physical attack. When a new hero is selected, the entire HP buff moves to them.

name: Chaos God
unlock_text: This God is temporary

powers.desc: Magical damage per second is dealt to both allies and enemies (not lethal). This is a temporary God that will be removed from your armory after Season 2

name: Dazzle
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Shallow Grave
powers.desc: Cast Shallow Grave on the first ally to fall within 20% HP threshold. Duration is based on shop level.

powers.name: Cheating Death
powers.desc: Your god will survive a death blow (goes down to 1 hp).

name: Donkey Aghanim
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Sorcery For Dummies: Volume 2
powers.desc: Heroes can use multiple ultimates, but shop upgrades are more expensive

name: The Gambler
unlock_text: This God is temporarily unlocked by subscribing to PLUS. They are permanently unlocked if they drop from a God chest

powers.name: Roll the Dice
powers.desc: Before your next fight, make a bet. If you win the next round, gain gold in the next shopping phase. If you lose, you get less gold for the following round. The amount of gold is a range of values based on a your shop level.

name: Icefrog
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.name: Balance In All Things
powers.desc: Get access to all banned spells. Shop contains additional slots.

name: J'Muy the Wise
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Wisdom of the Elders
powers.desc: Ability cooldowns now pause between rounds, but all abilities have cooldown reduction. Cooldown reduction scales with shop level.

name: Kanna
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Prey on the Weak
powers.desc: Selected hero gains 9 attack speed for each ally summon. Summons gain half of this value. You will not lose attack speed if any summons die.

name: Lady Anshu
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Hymn of St. Crella
powers.desc: When selected hero dies, they will revive all dead allied heroes with reduced HP.

name: Legion Commander
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Stonehall Pike
powers.desc: Legion Commander God gains damage every round based on the total spell points your team has. Selected ally hero will gain this damage buff.

name: Lifestealer
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Feast
powers.desc: Upon winning a round, Lifestealer heals himself (can overheal with no limit).

name: Nature's Prophet
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.name: Nature's Prophet
powers.desc: You can position your heroes anywhere on the board.

name: Ogre Magi
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Multicast
powers.desc: Selected unit has a chance to multicast a spell. The chance is tied to the amount of total spell points your team has.

name: Phantom Assassin
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Veiled Pact
powers.desc: Your units have a chance to deal a critical strike to enemies. They gain crit damage per number of units they travel. This buff lasts the entire round.

name: Pudge
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Beefy Boy
powers.desc: Your God has more starting health.

name: Rix, Oathbound
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Oathed
powers.desc: Selected hero is silenced and has bonus damage. If selected unit is revived successfully, the damage buff is doubled.

powers.name: Assault
powers.desc: When an Oathed hero is killed, they will be revived after a delay with reduced HP as long as another ally hero is still alive. When revived, they will respawn in the back of the arena. Each revival will add an additional delay to the respawn time. Timer resets each round.

name: Rubick
unlock_text: This God is temporarily unlocked by subscribing to PLUS. They are permanently unlocked if they drop from a God chest

powers.name: Spell Steal
powers.desc: Selected unit gains Spell Steal, which upgrades based on how many total spell points you have. Spell Steal does not count towards your four spell hero limit.

name: Rune God
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Fill Bottle
powers.desc:
Selected unit gains a random rune at the beginning of battle. Each shop upgrade will give more runes.

Tier 4 runes: Water (procs when receiving damage), Haste. 
Tier 3 runes: Invisibility (attacking out of invis deals extra damage), Regeneration (procs when spending mana).
Tier 2 runes: Bounty (gives the player extra gold for the following round), Illusion.
Tier 1 runes: Arcane, Double Damage.

Shop Level 1: Your bottle is empty.
Shop Level 2: Get a Tier 4 Rune.
Shop Level 3: Get a Tier 3 & 4 Rune.
Shop Level 4: Get a Tier 2 ,3 & 4 Rune.
Shop Level 5: Get a Tier 1, 2, 3 & 4 Rune.

name: Selemene
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Dark Moon Blessing
powers.desc: Every time an ally hero spends mana, all your heroes gains 0.02% spell amplification. Buff resets every round.

name: Shopkeeper
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked with a specific amount of coins

powers.name: Let's Make a Deal
powers.desc: You can only upgrade your shop to level 3, but all spells cost 2 gold (and sell for 1). The amount of spells that appear in your shop is also reduced to 2/3/4.

name: Sorla Khan
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Warmonger
powers.desc: Sorla Khan deals 2% more damage to other Gods for each surviving ally hero. For every 50 damage she has dealt, her team gains a stacking 8% attack damage buff.

name: Tinker
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked with a specific amount of coins

powers.name: Rearm
powers.desc: Every round, re-rolls have reduced cost until you buy something or you re-roll a certain amount of times.

name: Tome God
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.name: Tome of Knowledge
powers.desc: Levels your shop to the next level for free.

powers.name: Tome of Experience
powers.desc: Every time you level your shop, your heroes gain an extra level.

name: Tower God
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Building
powers.desc:
Once the battle begins, the selected unit cannot move and is rooted, while its attack range is set to a minimum. This root is disabled if you are the last allied hero alive or you are facing a fellow Tower God. Activating this ability will enable your Glyph of Fortification Passive.

Voiced by our dear friend PyrionFlax

powers.name: Glyph of Fortification
powers.desc:
When a hero dies, all remaining heroes become immune to any kind of damage temporarily. This ability is only active if you are using the Building ability, and your Building unit is alive.

Voiced by our dear friend PyrionFlax

name: Toy Pudge
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Patchwork Plague
powers.desc: Enemy heroes they take increased spell damage per number of units they travel. This buff lasts the entire round.
